_meanings:
{@--2@} A man of a degraded tribe
in general, an outcast, a Cāṇḍāla.

{@--3@} Especially, the son of a 
Brāhmaṇa by a Śūdra woman; <ab>cf.</ab>  
<ls>Ms. 10. 8.</ls>

{@--4@} (In music) The first
(more properly the last or seventh)
note of the Hindu gamut;  
{#gItakalAvinyAsamiva nizAdAnugataM#} <ls>K. 31</ls> (where
it has sense 1 also).
